title: Klepto

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Steal an enemy's cap at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Stealing another player's cap effectively disables their primary ability as determined by the host. They are notified of this.
- Players may get their cap back by either your death, or visiting a player of your choosing. This may be a koopa. You cannot choose yourself.

desc:
Post 1996
*Give me back my hAT YOU SON OF A-*
